title: Psychiatry & Behavioral Health
description: Our psychiatrists and behavioral health experts provide comprehensive care for children, teens and adults struggling with anxiety and depression.
cleaned_text: Behavioral Health The Department of Psychiatry & Behavioral Health provides assessment, consultation, diagnosis and treatment for an array of psychiatric and behavioral health conditions. Our board-certified therapists are available to provide comprehensive psychiatric and behavioral health services to all age groups, including children, adolescents, adults and elderly persons. Our counselors can help identify potential causes and make individualized recommendations for depression treatment.
